FuncDecl.Name: GetCurrentTheme
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the current theme style factory object. Call <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::theme::RegisterTheme(& const WString,Ptr<ThemeTemplates>)@s:vl.presentation.theme.RegisterTheme(& const WString,Ptr{ThemeTemplates})" /></links> or <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::theme::UnregisterTheme(& const WString)@s:vl.presentation.theme.UnregisterTheme(& const WString)" /></links> to change the default theme.</summary> <returns>The current theme style factory object.</returns> </Document>
